from jason

A digital garden for a physical meat bag.

What's up nerds, I'm Jason.

Welcome. I trust you found the place okay? Coming way out here to the digital wilderness, I bet you're tired and hungry, huh? Well, this is the internet. I can't feed you or anything. Weirdos. But, I'm happy to show you around.

This is my space. I designed it myself. Some may refer to it as a digital garden. It's where I store my writings, projects, thoughts, internet oddities, failed dreams, and new hopes. It's ever-changing, and at times, ill-defined. And that's fine by me.

Feel free to poke around. I'm glad you're here.
